portPeakrateTable.name: portPeakrateTable
portPeakrateTable.description: A table of objects that display the 1min peak rate statistics information. This group will be implemented in managed Ethernet switches devices.

portPeakrateEntry.name: portPeakrateEntry
portPeakrateEntry.description: A set of objects that display the statistics information of the port.

portIfOutIndex.name: portIfOutIndex
portIfOutIndex.description: A unique value for each interface. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of ifNumber. The value for each interface must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of the entity's network management system to the next re-initialization.

portPeakrateEnable.name: portPeakrateEnable
portPeakrateEnable.description: The state of the port`s peak rate statistic function.

portInUnicastPktsPeak.name: portInUnicastPktsPeak
portInUnicastPktsPeak.description: The unicast packet peak rate of the port IN direction in ppm(packets per minute).

portInUnicastTime.name: portInUnicastTime
portInUnicastTime.description: The unicast packet peak rate time(YYYYMMDD-hh:mm:ss,such as 20090622-09:30:20) of the port IN direction.

portInMulticastPktsPeak.name: portInMulticastPktsPeak
portInMulticastPktsPeak.description: The multicast packet peak rate of the port IN direction in ppm(packets per minute).

portInMulticastTime.name: portInMulticastTime
portInMulticastTime.description: The multicast packet peak rate time(YYYYMMDD-hh:mm:ss,such as 20090622-09:30:20) of the port IN direction .

portInBroadcastPktsPeak.name: portInBroadcastPktsPeak
portInBroadcastPktsPeak.description: The broadcast packet peak rate of the port IN direction in ppm(packets per minute).

portInBroadcastTime.name: portInBroadcastTime
portInBroadcastTime.description: The broadcast packet peak rate time(YYYYMMDD-hh:mm:ss,such as 20090622-09:30:20) of the port IN direction.

portInTotalErrPktsPeak.name: portInTotalErrPktsPeak
portInTotalErrPktsPeak.description: The total error packet peak rate of the port IN direction in ppm(packets per minute).

portInTotalErrTime.name: portInTotalErrTime
portInTotalErrTime.description: The total error packet peak rate time(YYYYMMDD-hh:mm:ss,such as 20090622-09:30:20) of the port IN direction .

portOutUnicastPktsPeak.name: portOutUnicastPktsPeak
portOutUnicastPktsPeak.description: The unicast packet peak rate of the port OUT direction in ppm(packets per minute).

portOutUnicastTime.name: portOutUnicastTime
portOutUnicastTime.description: The unicast packet peak rate time(YYYYMMDD-hh:mm:ss,such as 20090622-09:30:20) of the port OUT direction.

portOutMulticastPktsPeak.name: portOutMulticastPktsPeak
portOutMulticastPktsPeak.description: The multicast packet peak rate of the port OUT direction in ppm(packets per minute).

portOutMulticastTime.name: portOutMulticastTime
portOutMulticastTime.description: The multicast packet peak rate time(YYYYMMDD-hh:mm:ss,such as 20090622-09:30:20) of the port OUT direction.

portOutBroadcastPktsPeak.name: portOutBroadcastPktsPeak
portOutBroadcastPktsPeak.description: The broadcast packet peak rate of the port OUT direction in ppm(packets per minute).

portOutBroadcastTime.name: portOutBroadcastTime
portOutBroadcastTime.description: The broadcast packet peak rate time(YYYYMMDD-hh:mm:ss,such as 20090622-09:30:20) of the port OUT direction.

portOutTotalErrPktsPeak.name: portOutTotalErrPktsPeak
portOutTotalErrPktsPeak.description: The total error packet peak rate of the port OUT direction in ppm(packets per minute).

portOutTotalErrTime.name: portOutTotalErrTime
portOutTotalErrTime.description: The total error packet peak rate time(YYYYMMDD-hh:mm:ss,such as 20090622-09:30:20) of the port OUT direction.

portClearPeakPkts.name: portClearPeakPkts
portClearPeakPkts.description: Clear peak statistics of the whole ports which are enable.
